text: yara birata thake gurutara papa o aslila kaja theke, chotakhata aparadha byatita [1]. Niscaya apanara rabera ksama aparisima; tini tomadera samparke samyaka abagata---yakhana tini tomaderake srsti karechilena mati hate ebam yakhana tomara matrgarbhe bhrunarupe chile. Ata'eba, tomara atmaprasansa karo na, tini'i samyaka janena tara samparke ye taka'oya abalambana kareche
